AboutComponent.title: About Us
AboutComponent.description: We are dedicated professionals offering reliable electrical and home maintenance services tailored to your needs. Whether it's a quick fix or a complete system check, our expert team ensures your safety and satisfaction. With years of experience and a passion for quality work, we take pride in delivering solutions that last.
AboutComponent.description1: Need a job done right--and fast? Our skilled technicians are ready to help with dependable, same-day services. We bring a friendly attitude, deep, expertise, and commitment to exceeding your expectations.
AboutComponent.service2: Satisfaction backed by our Handy Happiness Guarantee
AboutComponent.service3: 24/7 support from a real human (no bots!)
AboutComponent.service4: Honest pricing with no hidden fees

services.title: COMPUTER MAINTENANCE
services.description: Keep your devices running smoothly with our expert computer maintenance services. From virus removal to system optimization, we ensure your machines are secure, fast, and reliable

services.title: NETWORK INSTALLATION
services.description: We design and install efficient and secure network systems for homes and businesses. Wether wired or wireless, our networks are built for speed, stability and future growth.

services.title: ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION
services.description: Our certified electricians handle all types of electrical installations--from lighting and sockets to full wiring systems. We ensure safe, code-compliant work for new builds or renovations.

services.title: ELECTRICAL MATERIALS
services.description: We supply high-quality electrical component and accessories. Wether you're a contractor or a DIY enthusiast, you'll find everything you need--from cables to circuit breakers--at competitive prices

ContactComponent.title: Contact Us
ContactComponent.description: Satisfying you is all that we long for, that is why we put you first in all that we do. Our contact details are always ready to have your request.
ContactComponent.description1: You matter to us. Here at Electrica, there is always something for everyone! Contact me now to book a service or buy a product.
